title: Exercise: Chain Multiple Jobs in an Automation

questions.question: If two workspaces are chained in parallel and have the same job queue, what happens if only one engine is free?
options: The workspace that appears at the top of the automation will run first
The workspaces will run in alphabetical order
There is no guarantee regarding which workspace will run first
The workspace order can be determined by the order parameter setting in the automation

questions.question: If two workspaces are chained one after the other in an Automation, when will the second workspace be triggered?
options: The second workspace will be triggered when the first workspace's first feature has been written
The second workspace will be triggered when the first workspace finishes running
The second workspace will be triggered right away
The second workspace will not be triggered

questions.question: Which Automation Action should you use if you want to run different workspaces based on the contents of an upstream message?
